title: Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations in an Ontology Subsection (or Profile)

fields.label: General Placement

fields.message: General Information for a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations

fields.label: General Title of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_title_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title of a fake subpage (or section) for locations in area of expertise subsection [or profile]).

fields.label: General Intro Text of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_intro_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., intro text of a fake subpage (or section) for locations in area of expertise subsection [or profile]).

fields.label: General Featured Image of a Fake Subpage (or Section) for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_featured_image_general
fields.instructions:
Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.

fields.message: General Reference to the Main Location Archive

fields.label: General Title of a Reference to the Main Location Archive
fields.name: location_fpage_ref_main_title_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages for locations contain references linking users back to the main location archive. This sets the title used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title in a reference to the main location archive on a fake subpage for locations in an area of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Body Text of a Reference to the Main Location Archive
fields.name: location_fpage_ref_main_intro_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages for locations contain references linking users back to the main location archive. This sets the body text used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default body text structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., body text in a reference to the main location archive on a fake subpage for locations in an area of expertise subsection).
fields.placeholder: Discover our extensive network of [locations], offering exceptional care across specialties within UAMS Health. Explore our diverse [locations] and find the one closest to you.

fields.label: General Link Text of a Reference to the Main Location Archive
fields.name: location_fpage_ref_main_link_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages for locations contain references linking users back to the main location archive. This sets the link text used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default link text structure will be used.

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., link text in a reference to the main location archive on a fake subpage for locations in an area of expertise subsection).

fields.message: General Reference to a Top-Level Ontology Item's Fake Subpage for Locations

fields.label: General Title of a Reference to a Top-Level Ontology Item's Fake Subpage for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_ref_top_title_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages under nested ontology items contain references linking users back to the same type of fake subpage under the top-level ancestor ontology item (e.g., from "Bone Cancer Care Locations" to "Cancer Care Locations"). This sets the title used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used.

fields.label: General Body Text of a Reference to a Top-Level Ontology Item's Fake Subpage for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_ref_top_intro_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages under nested ontology items contain references linking users back to the same type of fake subpage under the top-level ancestor ontology item (e.g., from "Bone Cancer Care Locations" to "Cancer Care Locations"). This sets the body text used in that reference.

If you leave this blank, the default body text structure will be used.
fields.placeholder: Discover our extensive network of [locations], offering exceptional care across specialties within UAMS Health. Explore our diverse [locations] and find the one closest to you.

fields.label: General Link Text of a Reference to a Top-Level Ontology Item's Fake Subpage for Locations
fields.name: location_fpage_ref_top_link_general
fields.instructions:
Fake subpages under nested ontology items contain references linking users back to the same type of fake subpage under the top-level ancestor ontology item (e.g., from "Bone Cancer Care Locations" to "Cancer Care Locations"). This sets the link text used in that reference.
